articles.title: Giant blade breaks off Mass. wind turbine
articles.description:
There were no injuries when the massive blade detached and plunged into a nearby cranberry bog.

The post Giant blade breaks off Mass. wind turbine appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A massive wind turbine blade broke off and fell into a cranberry bog.
The incident occurred without any injuries reported to nearby residents.
Local cranberry farmers may face disruptions due to potential damage from the fallen blade.

articles.title: 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now
articles.description:
The best of what's new streaming on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, Disney Plus, and more.

The post 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Discover five new movies and TV shows available for streaming in November 2025.
Streaming platforms include Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, and Disney Plus.
Boston residents can enjoy diverse entertainment options during the upcoming winter months.

articles.title: Stefon Diggs reveals what he’s trying to improve about himself after 11 years in the NFL
articles.description:
“I have a way of getting mad at everything, and I want everything to be perfect.”

The post Stefon Diggs reveals what he’s trying to improve about himself after 11 years in the NFL appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stefon Diggs aims to improve his attitude after 11 NFL seasons.
Diggs acknowledges his tendency to get frustrated with perfectionism.
His self-improvement could enhance team dynamics for the Patriots.

articles.title: Commuter train plows through car on tracks in Acton
articles.description:
No injuries were reported in the railroad crossing collision.

The post Commuter train plows through car on tracks in Acton appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Commuter train collided with a car at a railroad crossing in Acton.
No injuries were reported in the incident on November 7, 2025.
Local residents are reminded to exercise caution at railroad crossings.
